results.content: Wow, this is amazing, i once got stucked with blog development in bubble. I haven't found any robust solution. This course helped sort out that issue from depending on templates and migrate our selves to creating our own blog. Soon, we added the timeliness to develop this. And also the database linking is so clear with the repeating groups which helps me to understand bubble more better now. Great work and explanation. Thanks

This course helped sort out that issue from depending on templates and migrate our selves to creating our own blog. Soon, we added the timeliness to develop this.
